trans-unit.source: Provides generalized transformation support for objects, such as points and rectangles.
This is an abstract class.
A transform defines how to map points from one coordinate space into another coordinate space.
They can be used to produce effects such as rotation, scaling, and skewing.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> class.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets the inverse transformation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref>, if possible.
An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise `null`.
Creates a string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref>.
A string representation of this instance.
Creates a string representation of this instance, based on the passed <xref href="System.IFormatProvider"></xref> parameter.
<xref href="System.IFormatProvider"></xref> instance used to process this instance.
A string representation of this instance, based on provider.
Transforms the specified point and returns the result.
The point to transform.
The result of transforming point.
The transform did not succeed.
When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified bounding box and returns an axis-aligned bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
The bounding box to transform.
The smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains the transformed rect.
When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
The point to transform.
The result of transforming inPoint.
`true` if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, `false`.
Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
The format to use.
-or-
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref href="System.IFormattable"></xref> implementation.
The provider to use to format the value.
-or-
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
